Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I found multiple bugs in the training scenarios of KSP, the most annoying being in one of the crucial missions (for me, at least): the one that flies you into orbit. In the scenario you are supposed to follow the purple rabb...eh...target into the orbital manouver, but, no matter what, after the decoupling of the expended thrusters the tutorial breaks: the instructor tells you you're off course even if you are using the SAS autopiloting function. That's amazingly annoying! 

 

I play Kerbal via CKAN (v 1.16.1) and the only mod installed is the Enivronmental Visual Enhancements (v 2:EVE-1.1-1).

 

Any guess?
